gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 108, Warriors 106
gameRecap.excerpt: P.J. Washington gets the layup to fall with 4.5 seconds remaining in regulation to lift the Mavericks over the Warriors, 108-106. Washington led all scorers with 32 points (5-8 3pt. FG), five rebounds and a career-high five steals for the Mavericks, while Kyrie Irving added 26 points, eight rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Stephen Curry notched 28 points (5-14 3pt. FG), six rebounds and five assists for the Warriors in the losing effort. The Mavericks have won back-to-back games as they improve to 47-30 on the season, while the Warriors snap a 6-game win streak and fall to 42-35.
